 At a population growth rate of 1.32% per year that gives us 148 years before the world reaches max population. Hmmm, I figured the number would be bigger. Perhaps I miscalculated?? Wow, I guess there really isn't a whole lot of time to figure out how to get population under control. However I think the answer to that is industrialization since industrialized nations often slow their population growth substantially. If India and China were both to become industrialized, I think population growth worldwide would be almost stagnant.

India and China are the ones that will really increase the worlds population until they lower their rate to almost zero.
